name: Gulf Coast Teaching Family Services, Inc.

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Gulf Coast Teaching Family Services, Inc. is a In Home Supportive Care provider based in Lafayette, LA. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $13.0M in Medicaid payments across 110K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $13.0M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
